Handle OAuth callback from provider and set authentication cookie

get.description: Get detailed import session with enriched data including initial balance, context value, transactions, and stats
get.summary: Get import session with enriched data

delete.description: Delete an import session and all its staged transactions

post.description: Bind staged transactions to recurring transaction patterns in batch. Automatically copies category, subcategory, tags, and description from each recurring pattern.
post.summary: Bind staged transactions to recurring patterns

post.description: Close an import session and trigger reconciliation. Updates all VALIDATING transactions to PAID status. Requires admin role. For card context, also updates invoice status to PAID.
Commit all READY staged transactions to their respective main tables (incomes, expenses, transfers, etc). Sets transaction status to VALIDATING or IGNORE based on the ignore flag.
post.summary: Commit staged transactions to main tables

post.description: Trigger enrichment for all PENDING staged transactions in a session.

get.description: Get all staged transactions for a specific import session

post.description: Create one or more staged transactions for an import session

delete.description: Delete all staged transactions for a specific import session
delete.summary: Delete all staged transactions in session

post.description: Upload a CSV file to import transactions into the session. The file is parsed and transactions are created as staged.
